title: Kindly Suggest Itinerary For 4 days Goa trip
text: India Mike » India Travel » States in India » Goa » Kindly Suggest Itinerary For 4 days Goa trip Kindly Suggest Itinerary For 4 days Goa trip # 1 We Four friends are reaching Goa on 23 oct 10 am at margaon. This is our first trip to Goa so kindly someone suggest itinerary for 23,24,25 and 26 oct and also suggest places to visit. Plz suggest where to stay(near which beach) to enjoy the most? Economic guest house/lodges pricing under 500-800/day? Any idea about pricing of car/cab if we hire a vehicle for 4 persons? Go to colva .... Very close to madgaon rlwy station ... place to chill nice long beach strech and nice Indian restaurants सैरकरदुनियाकीगालिबजिंदगानीफिरकहां, जिंदगानीगररहीतोनौजवानीफिरकहां। # 3 Ravi you can stay near Madgaon Railway station in lodge, it will economical to your group. For sight seeing You can take tourist bus from Lodge which charge Rs. 200 per person and it will take you North Goa one day and other day you can go to South Goa. It takes almost full day. If you like boat ride at COCO beach it charge Rs. 250 and for Mandovi river cruise it charge Rs. 250. In two days you will cover Goa and then you can decide on which beach you want to spend your other two days. Food cost almost same as your place, but your group can enjoy beer little cheaper then your place. If your group can drive Motorcycle/Scooter then it will economical. You can rent a Motorbike for Rs. 300 and petrol price extra. Enjoy your vacation Quote: Originally Posted by surinder20e Ravi you can stay near Madgaon Railway station in lodge, it will economical to your group. You should be banned from this site for giving such ridiculous advice!!!! I'd personally stay at Benaulim next to Colva as it's more mellow and relaxed. But a lot of Indians prefer Colva. And it's just a nice 2 km. stroll along the beach between the two. And your not from Canada. You can't even speak proper English!
